name: Three Lesbians in a Winter Special
name_original: Three Lesbians in a Winter Special
description:
It's Snowmas tomorrow, and Trixie is excited to spend it with her best friend Tabby and her best friend / greatest rival Nikita!

Still, all is not well, for at the stroke of midnight Snowmas tradition dictates the group must reveal their deepest wishes to one another, and Trixie's self confidence wavers more than ever...

'Three Lesbians in a Winter Special' is a short bitsy sequel to the visual novels 'The Testimony of Trixie Glimmer Smith' and 'Three Lesbians in a Barrow' (but this story is stand-alone and contain *very* minimal 'spoilers' if you haven't played the previous games!)

How To Play:

Use the WASD keys, the arrows keys or swipe to move and advance dialogue.  Press or swipe right to choose an option. Walk into something to interact with it. There's lots of look at, so try walking into anything that catches your eye whether that be an interesting poster, a snowy stick, a *tiny* Snowmas decoration or a even grouchy deer!

Acknowledgements:

Features art by the wonderful Deer, a festive rendition of the series soundtrack by the musical DEastes and original character designs by the lovely R.T! As well as the following bitsy hacks by Sean S. LeBlanc: Transparent Sprites, Bitsymuse, Dialog choices, Long dialog, Character portraits, and the custom BG hack by Ben and Freya!

Content Warnings:

(Light-heartedly) argumentative relationships, suggestive content, bad language, and discussion of insecurity.
